attributes.action: BRING BACK ALL BRITISH ARMED FORCES PERSONNELL FROM IRAQ AND AFGHANISTAN NOW
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I give my full support to all our armed service personnel in the gulf, they are credit to us all.

I would like to see all our boys and girls brought home from a conflict that does not concern us, before any more lives of our brave millitary die.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
